info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 11:47PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Elkhart, Lagrange, southern Cass and southern St. Joseph Counties through 1215 AM EDT... At 1145 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sturgis to Elkhart. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elkhart, Goshen, Sturgis, Three Rivers, Lagrange, Simonton Lake, Dunlap, Middlebury, Constantine, Bristol, White Pigeon, Centreville, Edwardsburg, Millersburg, New Paris, Benton, Union, Nottawa, Scott and Fawn River. This includes Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 89 and 132. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
